extendedInfo.description: EWTNâs TV and Radio: Live and On Demandâ¢ TV and Radio Live Streamsâ¢ Video on demand (Television Programs)â¢ Audio on demand (Radio Programs)â¢ Newsâ¢ Program scheduleFREE: RSV-Bible text with entire Gospel of Mark audio (99 minutes) featuring Blair Underwood as Mark - plus full text of the RSV-CE Bible and access to EWTN Live content.  At anytime you can purchase the complete New Testament audio.The EWTN Bible is powered by the Truth & Life Audio Bible a celebrity-voiced "radio drama" of the entire RSV-CE New Testament.  More than 70 actors help bring the scriptures to life in this 22-hour audio production, complete with movie-quality sound effects and an original music score.  This award-winning audio New Testament is  endorsed with an Imprimatur from the Vatican and including a foreword by Pope Benedict XVI. Voiced by internationally-renowned actors including: Neal McDonough, Stacy Keach, Kristen Bell, Sean Astin, Michael York, Blair Underwood,Malcolm McDowell, Brian Cox, Julia Ormond, John Rhys-Davies and many more. 70 actors - 20 audio engineers - 10 studios over 3 continents - more than 100 media development experts - and 10,000 production hours were needed to create this world-class audio New Testament.In addition to this amazing audio, the app features:â¢ Complete text of RSV-CE synchronized with audio for the New Testament.â¢ Go directly to any verse and hear and see the Bible instantly.â¢ Use the built in playlist to hear the New Testament in 40 days or in Chronological order.â¢ Create your own playlist of verses.â¢ Remembers where you left off.â¢ Sleep timer â¢ Support for headphone pause and play buttons â¢ Easily fit entire 22 hours of audio on your Android.âThe Truth & Life Dramatized audio Bible is entirely faithful to the text of the Holy Scriptures. The manner in which the text is performed, beautifully assists the listener in understanding the meaning of the divinely inspired words within their context.  The background music and sound effects helps the listener to imagine the setting of each particular text of the Holy Bible. I am happy to give my wholehearted endorsement to the audio New Testament.â--Cardinal Raymond L. Burke,Perfect of the Apostolic Signature of the Holy SeeâThis is the way Scripture is supposed to sound. Revealing and passionate performances from world class actors, a lyrical translation, and sound effects that put you in the middle of the action. Whether youâve read the Bible a hundred times or are making the first contact, this is an experience you will not forget and one you will want to repeat often.â--Laura Ingraham,Radio Talk Show Host, New York Times Bestselling AuthorâWe learn by hearing as well as reading. Those who desire to become true disciples of Jesus will want to learn from His words in every way. For anyone interested in beginning or continuing their adventure of faith, I highly recommend this faithful and powerful presentation of the Word of God.â--The Most Reverend Charles Chaput,Archbishop of Philadelphia, PA

reviews.title: I love EWTN!
reviews.comment: Thank you for making this app. Now i can tune in whereever I may be. This network has been such an enriching influence and continues to be so. God bless you always and may the network continue to flourish by the grace of God
reviews.author: Roni M

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: I loved this app. But because my phone internal memory is low...I wish they had just the RSV Bible and not all the additions with this latest version.  I liked the older version...i.e. just the RSV Bible.
reviews.author: Victor Rodrigues

reviews.title: Outstanding!
reviews.comment: I have become an EWTN junkie.  This was a simple app to download and install.  I have a very inexpensive android phone and it runs really well on it, including the streaming video.  Very, very pleased.
reviews.author: Michael Donivan

reviews.title: Ewtn
reviews.comment: Thank you Mother Angelica, and all others who have dedicated their life in giving us these programs so that we maybe informed and participate along with the rest of the world. May God continue to bless all.
reviews.author: Darlene Zavala

reviews.title: Thank You Mother Angelica
reviews.comment: EWTN APP is the best app for our Catholic Faith GOD BLESS YOU MOTHER ANGELICA AND ALL THOSE THAT KEEP IT ALIVE... Listening to the Bible has taught me more this year then I have learned all my life
reviews.author: Max Gallegos

reviews.title: Very exciting
reviews.comment: Easy to use. Happy we have this Catholic app. Thanks Eternal Word television network. I gave it 4stars cos i cant hear the audio of all the readings...nonetheless, thumbs up. Im still happy.
reviews.author: Ngozzi Onuma

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Thak you for this app and also thanks the Knigth of Columbus for the support to EWTN. God bless them all.
reviews.author: Luis-Ignacio Rivera

reviews.title: It\'s more than the EWTN Religious Catalogue
reviews.comment: Nexus 10 4.3.  I saw the small icon for this app.  It says EWTN Religious Catalogue.  I passed over opening the thumbnail icon as I browsed through Play Google apps looking for Catholic apps.  Tonight I went through the list of apps again to see if I missed any I might like.  I saw EWTN RELIGIOUS CATALOGUE  again and decided to just take a peek inside.  Well, I am glad I did.  There\'s live TV and radio streams for around the world; TV & radio schedules; TV & radio on demand; EWTN news; Complete Bible text; Dramatized Audio NT Bible for purchase.  This app is EWTN\'S GLOBAL NETWORK -- for mobile devices.  There\'s plenty current and past content.  The app installed easily and runs without any problems on my Nexus 10.  Well done EWTN.
reviews.author: John W. Bakas, Jr.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I been watching EWTN ever since my grandma got me into and now I found this app I have EWTN everywhere I go :) Am so happy!!!!!
reviews.author: Iliana Hernandez

reviews.title: Life-changing!!! Ongoing miracle!
reviews.comment: Thank you Mother Angelica for your generous YES
reviews.author: Edwin Rodrigues

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Thanks for this app. I live in India and getting ewtn is next to impossible on satellite TV but thanks to this app I can view ewtn on my basic android phone. God bless all those who worked to get this app working.
reviews.author: Lydia Davidson

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Ewtn t.v./radio and much more. Now I can watch and listen to all my favorite programs!
reviews.author: Pieter Wycoff

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Very good, informative and incisive.  Highly recommended to all Catholics and Non-Catholics alike.
reviews.author: Sabinus Ukachi

reviews.title: LOVE THIS APP!
reviews.comment: EWTN any time, any where. <3 The best part is that opening videos and live streaming opens fast and without problems.  Why can\'t all my apps be this good?
reviews.author: Gemma Hudson

reviews.title: Excellent app for catholics to watch
reviews.comment: Excellent for catholics worldwide
reviews.author: Carr Jon

reviews.title: Good, but needs more frequent uploading
reviews.comment: Excellent concept.  Please upload content more frequently.  4 stars (not 5) because of \"stale\" content.
reviews.author: Robert Henry

reviews.comment: wonderful app :-)
reviews.author: Ma Carmina Geminiano

reviews.title: Awesome! !
reviews.comment: EWTN at my fingertips !!  I wish your programs were not weeks old !!  Dropped to 4 stars.
reviews.author: Robert Sledz

reviews.title: An excellent information source of the Universal church...
reviews.comment: Thanks you for sharing the faith and the Good news...!
reviews.author: jesi Kendra

reviews.title: Enjoy this app
reviews.comment: We love EWTN everywhere and all the time now. Great to have this app. We do not have cable TV.
reviews.author: Mark Davis
